Package middlewareapd.repository

Class MockJWTRepository

java.lang.Object
middlewareapd.repository.MockJWTRepository
public class MockJWTRepository extends Object
MockJWTRepository is a repository class that simulates a data store for JSON Web Tokens (JWTs). It provides methods to create, retrieve, and update mock JWT tokens for testing purposes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MockJWTRepository()
    Constructs a MockJWTRepository and initializes mock JWT tokens.

    • MockJWTRepository

      public MockJWTRepository()
      Constructs a MockJWTRepository and initializes mock JWT tokens.

  • Method Details

    • addToken

      public boolean addToken(JWToken token)
      Adds a new token to the repository.
      Parameters:
      token - the JWToken instance to add
      Returns:
      true if the token was added successfully, false if a token with the same UUID already exists

    • getAllTokens

      public List<JWToken> getAllTokens()
      Retrieves all tokens in the repository.
      Returns:
      a list of all JWToken instances

    • getTokenByUuid

      public JWToken getTokenByUuid(String uuid)
      Retrieves a specific token by its UUID.
      Parameters:
      uuid - the UUID of the token to retrieve
      Returns:
      the JWToken instance if found, or null if not

    • updateToken

      public void updateToken(JWToken token)
      Updates an existing token in the repository.
      Parameters:
      token - the JWToken instance to update

    • generateEmails

      public String[] generateEmails(int count)
      Generates an array of email addresses in the format user[number]@example.com.
      Parameters:
      count - the number of email addresses to generate
      Returns:
      an array of generated email addresses
